name: Punch Pong
description:
THE FAST-PACED
TURN-BASED PING PONG
FIGHTING GAME

Welcome to Punch Pong - the world's first ping pong fighting game - where you defeat your opponents from the far side of the table. Punch Pong is inspired by games like Street Fighter, Tekken, and Mortal Kombat... but there's a twist. Use special move combos to wear down your opponents and pay special attention to ball trajectories in order to find the right moment to strike.

Concentration, reflexes, and strategic quirk are your keys to victory.

Game Features

- Game-pad & keyboard compatible
- Complete events to unlock new characters and special moves
- Unlock versus mode to play against your friends in local multiplayer

NEW CONTENT EVERY MONTH This game is in expansion. On a monthly basis we will add:

- A new location
- New characters to unlock in player select
- New special moves to unlock

EARLY BIRD DISCOUNT Buy this game at a reduced price and all future Itch.io releases, content, and updates will be yours... forever!

No micro-transactions - ever - all new content comes unlockable with the game at your purchase price.

By adopting the game early, you also contribute to the current stretch goal.

CURRENT STRETCH GOAL NEW SPECIAL LOCATION

On top of our planned update, we will add a new special location to the game. It will be available for everyone who owns ( claims ) the game on Itch.io, now and in the future. The goal is based on Early Bird Discount sales and is made fully public so that you can check the on-going progress at anytime.
